TanPix2RaDec Class Reference

the transformation that handles pix to sideral transfos (Gnomonic, possibly with polynomial distortions). More...

#include <gtransfo.h>

Public Methods

 TanPix2RaDec (const GtransfoLin &Pix2Tan, const Point &TangentPoint, const GtransfoQuad *Corrections=NULL)
 Pix2Tan describes the transfo from pix to tangent plane (in degrees). TangentPoint in degrees. Corrections are applied between Lin and deprojection parts (as in Swarp).

 Inverse transfo: returns a TanRaDec2Pix if there are no corrections, or the iterative solver if there are.

 ~TanPix2RaDec ()

Detailed Description

the transformation that handles pix to sideral transfos (Gnomonic, possibly with polynomial distortions).

Member Function Documentation

double TanPix2RaDec::fit ( const StarMatchList & List,
const Gtransfo * PriorTransfo = NULL,
const Gtransfo * PosteriorTransfo = NULL ) [virtual]
 

fits a transfo to a list of star pairs (p1,p2).

After the fit this(PriorTransfo(p1)) yields approximately PosteriorTransfo(p2). The returned value is the chi2.

Reimplemented from Gtransfo.
